name: MediaTrackSettings.groupId
description: The MediaTrackSettings dictionary's groupId property is a browsing-session unique DOMString which identifies the group of devices which includes the source for the MediaStreamTrack. This lets you determine what value was selected to comply with your specified constraints for this property's value as described in the MediaTrackConstraints.groupId property you provided when calling either getUserMedia().

refs.name: Media Capture and Streams
refs.description: The definition of 'groupId' in the 'Media Capture and Streams' specification.
